sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Has Ukraine's counter-offensive started?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The answer to the question depends on who you believe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: On Thursday, Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said his troops need more time and weapons before they launch the push to reclaim terrain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But the head of Russia's Wagner mercenary group, Yevgeny Pogozhin, says the counter-offensive is already in full swing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Russian army says it repelled 26 attacks by Ukrainian forces on Thursday on a 95-kilometre front in the Soloday region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And on Friday, Kyiv announced that it had retaken territory around Bakhmut, something Prigozhin seemed to confirm.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Wagner chief called on the Kremlin to quote, stop lying about the situation in Bakhmut, claiming that regular Russian troops were fleeing and had abandoned the front line.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: President Zelensky, meanwhile, is set to visit Rome on Saturday to meet Italian leaders and possibly Pope Francis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Elsewhere, China announced it will send a senior representative to Kiev on Monday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It's not often you see the Pope sitting next to Italy's Prime Minister Giorgio Meloni as they share the same stage to discuss measures to increase Italy's birth rate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The occasion was a two-day meeting that brought together experts and policy makers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Italy has had some of the lowest birth rates in the EU and the country is ageing at a much faster rate than other European countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The issue is among the priorities of Giorgia Meloni's political program, but the man behind the event told us Italy's birth crisis is a national emergency and a cross-party issue.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Siamo convinti che su questa cosa non ci sia maggioranza opposizione, siamo tutti tutti convocati, nel senso che mondo delle banche, mondo delle imprese, mondo dei media, mondo dello spettacolo, ma anche tutti i partiti politici, perché cambiano i governi ma poi questo tema rimane.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Quindi l'obiettivo nostro, e un po' queste giornate lo stanno ad indicare, è quello di fare una grande nazionale dove tutti quanti collaborano e danno il loro contributo.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Le figure non sono rinforzate. Nel 2022 i bambini sono rinforzati a un nuovo live to a new historic low below 400,000, with the country recording more than 12 deaths for every seven births.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Maloney's right-wing government created the Ministry for Families and Birth Rate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Cutting sales taxes on baby care products and raising child benefits are some of the proposals the new cabinet included in its 2023 budget.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Experts warn that in order to reverse the trend, in its 2023 budget. Experts warn that in order to reverse the trend, the goal is to reach 500,000 newborns every year by the end of 2033.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: E su questo ci siamo confrontati tra forze politiche, tutte che si sono dette concordi a operare in maniera sinergica. Noi ne siamo contenti, noi siamo al governo solo da sei mesi, in questi sei mesi abbiamo non solo confermato tutti gli interventi che potevano favorire un welfare migliore per garantire un incremento demografico, ma abbiamo anche implementato le cifre a questo destinate e per Fratelli Italia è sempre stata una priorità. which means that it will be hard to get employees. But also problems to sustain both the pension and the health systems are some of the consequences of Italy's demographic crisis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: In their speeches, both Prime Minister Giorgio Meloni and Pope Francis insisted on the fact that crises are necessary to turn challenges into opportunities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Giorgio Orlandi for Euronews in Rome.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The stage is set at Eurovision 2023

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: and this year's 26 finalists have been selected.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Ten acts from each semi-final have qualified along with last year's winner, Ukraine, and the big five countries who fund Eurovision, France, Germany, UK, Spain and Italy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: We spoke to some of this year's performers and this is what you can expect on Saturday night.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Energy first, full of energy, of dance, of singing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: They're all great artists and I haven't seen one bad performance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: So everybody has such a good song.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: So it's really hard to just say choose one.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But the question on everyone's lips is who will win the Eurovision Song Contest 2023.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Here in Liverpool, Finland's carrier is a firm fan favorite.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Chug, chug, chug, chug, chug, chug, chug.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Definitely cheering for Finland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: I think Finland has really good chances of winning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Cha cha cha cha cha cha cha cha cha.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Online, Tattoo by Sweden's Loreen has been streamed on Spotify more than any other of this year's tracks, with Italy's Gio Evita by Marco Mangoni in second.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The bookies agree with Spotify and have the 2012 Eurovision winner Loreen pegged as this year's champ.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But all will be revealed on Saturday night.
